title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Game-Based Learning Course Through Economic Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Quantitative analysis of demand-supply curve changes through decision-making in economic simulation games (achieving 80% accuracy).
Establishment of optimal resource allocation strategies in game-based inflation/economic fluctuation scenarios (70% success rate).
Perform transaction simulations applying strategic negotiation skills through team-based virtual market games (complete at least two successful transactions)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
